text: gexsô marak horta temeeteeh, tokkel usun lee keenih gurrusa num ruubeeniih, woo num isi tagra qeelat qideeh Nabii Yuusuf teetit waxeexeeh teetit edde yewqe, tokkel qeelat tagra qide num kaa yuble waqdi isi kataysiisih seecak isee kee ken inkih aytikumuseeh berraakise tah qaxmeqe awka axcuk, kaa kee kay kataysis aka gexsô maray keenî luk sugey aracal keenik raaqek kaa yooqoreenih tellemmô duyyeh kaa haysitak, Yalli usun Nabii Yuusufuk abaanam yaaxigeeh tu kaak ma qellitta
